data.title: SBE on LinkedIn: #expertsatplay #teamsbe #teamsbe #knowledgemanagement #engineering
data.meta_description:
Knowledge 💡 is meant to be shared and that is exactly what our #expertsatplay did at our first knowledge symposium!

Yesterday, the knowledge managers from…
data.text:
🤝 𝗗𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝗮 𝘄𝗮𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁, 𝗮 𝘃𝗮𝗹𝘂𝗲 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗯𝗲𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗺𝗯𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗮𝗱𝗼𝗿𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗦𝗕𝗘-𝗙𝗜𝗧 𝗱𝗲𝗲𝗽𝗹𝘆 𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗱. 😅 After 5 years of sparking energy in all our #expertsatplay, it’s time to step up our game and spread the love even further. In a year where Stad Sint-Niklaas is launching its #teamSintNiklaas campaign, SBE is excited to create moments of connection beyond the office walls. Following a fierce KUBB tournament with 50 colleagues, winners Ronny Thomaes and Christophe Platinck received a special surprise: the chance to compete against the Kubbezen (André and Polle), a professional KUBB team and bronze medalists at the 2018 European Championships in SWITZERLAND. 🏆 👏🙌 👌 Despite the loud encouragement and frenzied atmosphere from #teamSBE on the sidelines, the Kubbezen drew the longest straw. But no harm done, it was a beautiful day for the love of sports! #greatplacetowork

Sustainability is at the heart of our growth. We’re thrilled to be recognized by Voka - Kamer van Koophandel Antwerpen-Waasland with the Voka Charter on Sustainable Entrepreneurship certificate, alongside 36 other forward-thinking companies. Over the past year, we've each taken diverse action points aligned with the United Nations' Sustainable Development Goals. Here’s a glimpse into some of SBE's action points: 🌼 A 𝗰𝗹𝗶𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗲-𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗹𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗿𝗲-𝗱𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗻𝘆 𝗴𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗻 was made to increase biodiversity and water infiltration. 📚 Installation of a 𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗲𝘅𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗯𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘁 in our front garden. 🏢 The opening of 𝘁𝘄𝗼 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗵𝘂𝗯𝘀 in Mechelen and Oostkamp to attract new colleagues and reduce the commuting distance. ♻️ Providing 𝗲𝗻𝘃𝗶𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗰𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿 𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗰𝘂𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗲 𝗰𝘆𝗰𝗹𝗲 𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 to determine the environmental impact of projects and make thoughtful choices at the beginning of the design process in terms of material consumption, energy emissions, … 🌱 Further roll-out of our in-house developed 𝘀𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗹 𝗦𝗣𝗜𝗥𝗜𝗧 (Sustainable Project Indicator to Reduce Impact) to pursue maximum levels of sustainable design solutions. For more information on all our sustainability initiatives, check out our website ⏩ https://lnkd.in/eeMhMBip

🏛 City hall vibes in the office yesterday as #teamSBE had the pleasure to welcome Alderman Robert Simons in Rotterdam! 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝘃𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁 𝘄𝗮𝘀 𝗮 𝘄𝗼𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗳𝘂𝗹 𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗴𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗥𝗼𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗱𝗮𝗺 𝗼𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗲, 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝘄𝗲 𝗵𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝗯𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮 𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺 𝗼𝗳 𝗮𝗯𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝟮𝟬 𝗰𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗴𝘂𝗲𝘀 𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟬. It was fantastic to feel so much support from Gemeente Rotterdam for our ✅ familial, ✅ flat and ✅ people-oriented company culture. The afternoon started with 𝗱𝘆𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗰 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 about our company and the socially relevant projects our #expertsatplay are dedicated to. Alderman Simons was genuinely intrigued by the impactful work we do every day. 🚴♂️ After a 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗩𝗥 𝗯𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝗿𝗶𝗱𝗲 through one of our latest developments the team challenged him with some tough and insightful questions during a lively 𝗤&𝗔 𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻. We wrapped up the visit with a joyful 𝗴𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽 𝗽𝗵𝗼𝘁𝗼 and a goodie bag packed with our best treats. 📸🎁 𝗔 𝗵𝘂𝗴𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗸 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘁𝗼 𝗔𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗷𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘂𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗱𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗼 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱. We're excited for the future and ready to keep making a positive impact in Rotterdam together!

🌟 New project in the Netherlands! 🌟 🤝 BESIX NL partnered with SBE for the design works on the Krammersluizen. SBE will be responsible for the preliminary design, detailed design, and execution design for the renovation of the five rolling gates of the navigation locks for push tows. The upgrades include installing butterfly valves, making the under carriages detachable, and modifying the buoyancy chambers. Rijkswaterstaat awarded this renovation project to the ZEEKR consortium. This collaboration involves BESIX NL as the main contractor, along with partners BESIX Unitec, Croonwolter&dros, DEMAKO, Iemants (part of Smulders) and Bosch Rexroth. Our sincere thanks to BESIX for this wonderful opportunity and best of luck to the project team! For more details, visit our project page ⏩ https://lnkd.in/exRGQunA

🚧 𝗨𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗶𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝘀𝘁 𝘁𝗼 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻 𝗮 𝗦𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗙𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲! 🌳 As part of Project R4WO, a comprehensive landscape biography was created by #teamsbe, offering valuable insights into the area's rich history and ecology. 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗯𝗶𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗵𝘆 𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗻 𝗶𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮 𝘂𝗻𝗶𝗾𝘂𝗲 𝗱𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝘀 𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗺𝗼𝗻𝗶𝗼𝘂𝘀𝗹𝘆 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗻𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗹 𝗲𝗻𝘃𝗶𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁. 🌱 The landscape biography brought stakeholders together and now forms the foundation for future policy and management. 𝗜𝘁 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘃𝗶𝗱𝗲𝘀 𝗮 𝗱𝗲𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗹𝗲𝗱 𝗱𝗲𝗽𝗶𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗽𝗲'𝘀 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗴𝗵 𝗵𝘂𝗺𝗮𝗻 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗻𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗹 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗹𝘂𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀. The layers, connections, and patterns that emerged inspired innovative design concepts that are both functional and sustainable. ♻️ We are proud to announce that the first groundbreaking of the Converting R4 East and West project took place a few weeks ago. 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗽𝗲 𝗯𝗶𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗵𝘆 𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝘀 𝗮 𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗳𝘂𝗹 𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗹 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮 𝗳𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲-𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗼𝗳 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗲𝗻𝘃𝗶𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗽𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗻𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗲𝘅𝗶𝘀𝘁 𝗼𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆. 🌍 Curious to discover more about the project R4WO? Check out our website 👉 https://lnkd.in/exP7iMn3 Project in collaboration with De Werkvennootschap - Arcadis - ipv Delft creatieve ingenieurs

🚴♂️ 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗹𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝘆𝗰𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗙𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 Velo-city conference 🚴♀️ Yesterday, we had the opportunity to host one of Velocite's technical visits, exploring the innovative cycling infrastructure between Stad Deinze and Stad Gent. The route highlighted the impressive Jacques Rogge Bridge, designed by #teamSBE. Our colleague and #expertatplay Tom De Soete provided insightful technical explanations on the bridge during the cyclists' visit. The tour, titled "Bonding and Bridging: A visit on the Cycling Highway F7," showcased approximately 25 km of cycling highways, bridges, and various safety measures that make cycling an ideal mode of transport in Flanders. 🚴♂️💨 𝗙𝗲𝗲𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗿𝘆𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝘁 𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗳? 𝗬𝗼𝘂 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗷𝗼𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗻𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱 𝗰𝘆𝗰𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗺𝗶𝘁 𝘂𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗹 𝗝𝘂𝗻𝗲 𝟮𝟭𝘀𝘁! In collaboration with Provincie Oost-Vlaanderen & Toerisme Vlaanderen - VISITFLANDERS

🚀 #teamsbe in the spotlight! 🚀 𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁 𝗩𝗹𝗮𝘀𝗯𝗿𝘂𝗴 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲 𝗼𝗳 Infosteel 𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗲! We are thrilled to share this milestone with you. The article beautifully highlights the innovative design of the S-shaped bicycle bridge, complete with stunning pictures that capture the essence of our work. Dive into the article to discover: 👉 The inspiration behind Vlasbrug 👉 The challenges 👉 The unique features that make this project stand out Click the link below to explore the full article of the award winning bridge. #teamsbe #expertsatplay #gptw

👍 We’re proud to share that our colleague and #expertatplay Guillaume Van Parys has been spotlighted in 'De Praatstoel' by Architectura In this engaging interview, he opens up about the journey and unwavering passion for landscape architecture, the key projects that have influenced his career and the commitment at SBE to integrate creativity, sustainability, and practicality in every project. 𝗖𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗼𝘂𝘀? 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗱 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘄 𝘃𝗶𝗮 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗸 𝗯𝗲𝗹𝗼𝘄. 👉 Check out our jobsite if you want to join #teamSBE too. #greatplacetowork
